main.name: Camin McCluskey
main.description: Currently working at [Skyscanner](https://skyscanner.net) and co-founder of [inHouse](https://inhouseapp.io)
main.bioHeadline: I'm a Software Engineer, currently working on identity infrastructure at [Skyscanner](https://skyscanner.net) in London. I am also the co-founder of an app for housemates - [inHouse](https://inhouseapp.io). Try it now for [iOS](https://apps.apple.com/gb/app/inhouse/id1488409238?l=nb) and [Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.inhouseapp.inhouse&hl=en_GB)!
main.bioBody: I graduated with First Class Honours in Management from the London School of Economics including a full scholarship year abroad at the University of California, Berkeley to study Computer Science and Machine Learning. I'm interested in Start-ups and Venture Capital, within in the technology sector. I have a particular interest in SaaS businesses leveraging Artificial Intelligence insights.

resume.skillmessage: This is the technology stack I use most commonly.

education.school: London School of Economics and Political Science

education.description: Studied abroad on a full scholarship. Focus was on Computer Science and Machine Learning.

work.title: Software Engineer

work.title: Co-Founder
work.description: The app for housemates. Deal with expenses and household tasks effortlessly. Try it now for [iOS](https://apps.apple.com/gb/app/inhouse/id1488409238?l=nb) and [Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.inhouseapp.inhouse&hl=en_GB).

work.company: The London School of Economics and Political Science
work.title: Research Assistant
work.description: Assisted the research of Professor Catherine Thomas, examining the impact of multinational M&A activity in the Belgian market on international trade flows. Also assisted Professor Thomas and Dr Andrew Bernard (Dartmouth College) with research regarding Foreign Direct Investment into Eastern Europe.

work.title: Supply Chain Excecution Intern
work.description: Internship project was to improve the inter fulfillment center transfer prediction accuracy. Created machine learnng models which improved prediction accuracy for Outbound Inter-Fulfilment Center transfers by 236bps (7.89%) and Inbound Inter-Fulfilment Center transfers by 953bps (14.85%).

work.title: Intern
work.description: Wrote scripts to pull data from MongoDB into team slack channels and from Mixpanel into Biz Dev dashboards and speadsheets for analysis. Identified and tracked KPIs and metrics which drove customer retention.

work.company: Artifical Intelligence in Business and Entrepreneurship (AIBE)
work.title: Head of Demonstrations
work.description: Worked with a team of 13 students, from the London School of Economics, Imperial College London and UCL to organise and run the inaugural AIBE summit - the largest conference on the topic of artificial intelligence within business. Held in the Queen Elizabeth II conference centre on February 4th 2017 it attracted approximately 700 delegates.
